Thanks for purchasing this 3D Pixel Weapons & Tools pack!

This pack contains 6 unique low poly cartoon style models with textures that make them into 3D pixel-style weapons and tools. The models are as follow: A Sword, Pickaxe, Axe, Hammer, Hoe, and Shovel. There are also 4 textures/materials for each of these models. These textures are for Iron, Silver, Gold and Copper versions of these tools. There are in total 24 textures for these models.

Included in this pack is an image of the recommended import settings for the textures to give the textures the heighest possible quality.

Questions or recommendations? Visit our website: https://sites.google.com/site/lionassetssite/

Check out our page on the Unity Assets Store for more useful packs like this one:
https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/search/page=1/sortby=popularity/query=publisher:19483
